name: SmartNotes
content: SmartNotes features a modern design, user-friendly interface, and seamless performance across various platforms. This example demonstrates my ability to develop functional and practical web applications.
stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (Libraries: SwiperJS, ScrollReveal, Basiclightbox), Vite JS

name: Travlog
content: This visually appealing and user-friendly site offers an intriguing introduction to the concept of discovering and selecting cities to explore. Travlog is a prime example of my ability to create captivating and professional frontend experiences for a wide range of industries.
stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (Libraries: SwiperJS, GSAP, Fontawesome, Basiclightbox), Vite JS

name: Developer's Personal Website
content: This repository houses the outcome of our collaborative work on the team project at GoIT Academy. Together, we've crafted a professional personal website for Lloyd Jefferson, a fictional talented full-stack developer. My contributions: Section 'My Projects', Dark Theme functionality.
stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (Libraries: GSAP, Axios, SwiperJS, Accordion-js, izitoast), Vite JS

name: Tasty Kitchen
content: TastyKitchen offers recipes for every taste. From meat dishes to vegan options, breakfasts to desserts â€” find your perfect recipe with ease!
stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Next JS

name: E-Contacts
content: E-Contacts is an intuitive app for managing your contacts effortlessly. Add, edit, and quickly find the contacts you need with advanced search, keeping everything organized at your fingertips.
stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Vite JS
